title: A New Song
description: A dangerous quest. A timeless love. A thrilling story. Searching the world for the key to humanity s redemption, a Muslim poet and a Jewish doctor explore the historical and metaphysical origins of the Abrahamic traditions. After travelling across Europe and the Middle East and facing off against shadowy conspirators and violent extremists, they discover a truth that is powerfully simple yet never more urgent. Combining a thrilling plot with passionate humanism, A New Song gives readers a breathless glimpse of the secret to peace among all peoples.
author: Sarah Isaias
